channel.title: Got an Iphone! Woo!
channel.description:
Ok, i just got myself a new iphone and i love it.
I currently have a few applications but wanna know if you guys know of any other ones worth having.
The ones i currently have are: [b]Free[/b] Shazam Wooo! Button Labyrinth Lite Edition TapDefence [b]Paid[/b] Chocolate Shop Frenzy Daycare Nightmare Diner Dash Pocket God Virtual Villager Yahtzee Adventure

item.title: Got an Iphone! Woo!
item.dc:creator: @MujaheD Radeon
item.description:
@MujaheD wrote:

[quote=“solemn wishes, post:19, topic:257539”][quote author=MujaheD link=topic=339996.msg2635151#msg2635151 date=1232470138]
I wanted a 3g, but now I want an N95 8gb black edition.
[/quote]

E95 is a big waste of money, the phone is huge and its slow as hell. In my opinion ofcourse[/quote]

Well I haven’t really tried the black edition to see how fast it is, but I tried the normal version and it seemed pretty ok? Yeah I’m with you on the size, I didn’t like it when it first came out because of it’s size, but these days it seems all the phones are getting smaller, so I kind of got over that. It’s pretty cheap though, that’s because its quite old now, it’s about $380 USD? There’s not many other phones on the market with those features at that price is there?

Read full topic

item.title: Got an Iphone! Woo!
item.dc:creator: @Scrubs Scrubs
item.description:
@Scrubs wrote:

use iphone.mundu.com for chat client (msn, aim, gtalk, etc).
if you find a good irc client (i got colloQ atm) please tell me.

almost forgot, ifap.to - for the faps

Read full topic

item.title: Got an Iphone! Woo!
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

Uriko:

how so?

I can’t fit all my music in it, it really does need expandable memory IMO and the battery life sucks. It’s also a bit sad that I have to lose time jailbreaking it to get apps that should be in the App Store but Apple wont accept them, etc.
…And there are better alternatives…

Although I guess those are opinions.

Read full topic

item.title: Got an Iphone! Woo!
item.dc:creator: @Uriko Uriko
item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:24, topic:257539”][quote author=FastBawlz link=topic=339996.msg2635426#msg2635426 date=1232482931]

Fuck. I was planning on getting an ipod touch but walmart and best buy were out. I HAD TO ORDER IT

Do you know what its like to just… wait?

btw ipod touch is pretty much the same as an iphone, it just gets free internet and no calls.

iPod touch was the worse buy I ever made.
[/quote]
how so?[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Got an Iphone! Woo!
item.dc:creator: @runescape3dude runescape3dude
item.description:
@runescape3dude wrote:

[quote=“Ske, post:20, topic:257539”][quote author=Speljohan link=topic=339996.msg2635112#msg2635112 date=1232466723]

I agree with some of the people here.
Iphone is a big waste of money.

I have a 3year old phone and as long as it can call/sms it’s fine for me.
(d500 btw)
[/quote]Mine is 10 years old now

Hah!
Wich one is it?

I love the nokia 3330 or the 8310

Got one of this somewhere in my room:

800px-NOKIA_5510_blue_topview.jpg800×406
[/quote]
Not even close to sexy.

I had a nice ole t32($400), which got stolen by Maoris on the second to last day of school.

Read full topic

What does it matter how it looks?

item.description:

but i see no reason why the iphone is bad… although in retrospect this is the first new phone ive gotten in about 5 years

Read full topic

item.title: Got an Iphone! Woo!
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

[quote=“Squigglyo, post:10, topic:257539”][quote author=Kane. link=topic=339996.msg2635078#msg2635078 date=1232462941]

[quote author=Speljohan link=topic=339996.msg2635067#msg2635067 date=1232461553]

Over priced hunk of junk.
[/quote]this. Unless you jailbreak it, it isn’t even worth using as toilet paper.

Thing is, when you jailbreak it, it crashes a lot and doesn’t work properly at times.

The free applications are the better of the games you have stated.

If you want some other good games, I suggest tap tap revolution and icopter.
[/quote]So its basically useless then. Might as well get a regular phone that doesn’t cost 999999999999

True dat.

You could get a good function MP3 player/iPod + Great phone for less than the iPhone.
And the battery of your phone won’t die in a few minutes from running Music, Applications and software to make the phone pretty… It’s like Vista.

ive been playing games on this thing for the last 6 hours without charging it.
ive got a very decent mp3 player in it
and it was free

i see no reason not to have it[/quote]
We’re talking about wasting money on it. If it’s free then it’s all good.

Read full topic
